text: sorry. Are you both saying you can't picture things in your mind either?
the article is amazing, by the way. I'm a mind-picturer
yeah — my mind’s eye seems to be quite limited
hard to say for sure, but I feel like outlines at best
I even didn't know that it's not possible for some people. It's just a natural thing I do if I need for example to remember where I put something. Great article.
yeah, I don’t “see” anything in my mind. Everything to me is a really stream of dialogue

it’s weird to think about, I’ve just tried to “picture” to contents of my fridge and I can tell you where everything is and what we’re running low on etc… but there’s no imagery associated, I just “know”
If I try and remember where I put something I just end up talking to myself and running through things verbally in my mind
